generalIntro.introCopy:
Code Workshop Systems is owned and operated by myself, Dan Brown. For over a dozen years, I have provided London-based agencies and organisations with robust, reliable, standards-compliant digital content.

This page is still a work in progress, but it does demonstrate frontend techniques including:

  • Responsive/adaptive layout with 28 permutations
  • State management of all ui actions
  • JSON parsing and manipulation
  • Dust templating with conditional logic eg adapting to the content and structure of the data

Please contact me via LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/in/danbrownfrontend

Please have a browse (swipe!) of a selection of projects.

projects.projectDescription: Responsive components and calculators for Barclays.co.uk
projects.shortDescription: Responsive components and calculators for Barclays.co.uk

extendedInfo.agencyDetails: Sapient is a consulting and technology company with a global headcount of over 7k.
extendedInfo.workUndertaken: I was part of team responsible for refactoring existing components and calculators to work with the new responsive CMS on Barclays.co.uk
otherDetails: Working directly with Product Managers, designers and UX
Work with consideration of existing templates, modules and requirements of the CMS

extendedInfo.agencyDetails: AllSaints is a premium British fashion house with a dedicated digital team of over 70 people.
extendedInfo.workUndertaken: I was involved with developing new features and BAU work including extensive bugfixing over several release cycles.
otherDetails: Work with a packaged Chrome app kiosk used in stores worldwide
Support of a recruitment microsite using Squarespace

extendedInfo.agencyDetails: Future Platforms specialises in blending technology with innovation to create digital solutions that are genuinely useful to clients and their customers.
extendedInfo.workUndertaken: iPad/desktop sales tool for an iconic sporting venue. I was responsible for building the entire UI alongside a .net backend dev. The project incorporates custom touch interactions with an SVG map displaying data from the clients seating/sales API and programmatic zooming to arbitrary seat blocks.
otherDetails: Agile project team including UX and visual designers

projects.projectDescription: Initial templates for a responsive ecommerce site.

extendedInfo.agencyDetails: Amaze is a full service digital marketing, technology and commerce consultancy
extendedInfo.workUndertaken: Work on templates for a responsive ecommerce site using advanced SASS. The project required 'white labeling' considerations and a modular development approach.

projects.projectDescription: Rapid prototyping project to develop a webapp for a major utility.

extendedInfo.agencyDetails: Fjord is a global service design consultancy that is part of Accenture Interactive
extendedInfo.workUndertaken: Part of a rapid development team of four devs working closely with Interaction and Visual Designers to implement creative explorations of future capabilities in technology and service provision. The prototype tested positively with customers and the client decided to take the project to the next stage.

projects.projectDescription: Mobile site for New Look clothing retailer.
projects.shortDescription: Browse and buy from the New Look range.

extendedInfo.agencyDetails: Velti was founded over 13 years ago to develop and execute highly interactive campaigns for mobile operators
extendedInfo.workUndertaken: Part of a team of two frontend and one (Zend) PHP dev building the next-generation mobile site for New Look, providing both product browsing and a streamlined transactional flow. Working to a tight spec from the client, a variety of technical challanges were overcome to deliver the project.
otherDetails: Working with a pre-existing third-party API which supplied all product and store details

extendedInfo.agencyDetails: Accenture Interactive can help you grow your business in entirely new ways.
extendedInfo.workUndertaken: I was brought in to help produce iPad demos and interactive concept pieces to help Accenture staff pitch digital capabilities to their existing clients.

projects.shortDescription: Build-out of screens and flows for a tablet banking app

extendedInfo.agencyDetails: Brilliant Basics is a digital agency that helps define, design and construct customer centric digital products on the web, tablet and mobile
extendedInfo.workUndertaken: I was brought in to help produce additional screens and content for an iPad banking app which required quickly getting up to speed with their existing custom MVC framework. This also involved working with lead UX to implement client change requests and new functionality, estimating work and collaborating with other developers both offshore and local.
otherDetails: Work with existing custom MVC code

projects.projectDescription: Portal site for existing T-mobile and Orange resellers to access and migrate to new EE branding and marketing information

extendedInfo.agencyDetails: Sapient is a consulting and technology company with a global headcount of over 7k.
extendedInfo.workUndertaken: I was part of a two-man front end team developing a portal site for internal partners. Due to a short deadline, the pages were developed from wireframes and styleguides with full GD for only some of the elements, this was successfully accomplished by an ongoing consultation and onscreen review process with designers and IA's.

Front end support for offshore Jahia CMS developers

projects.shortDescription: Part of a three man 'Phase 2' FE team extending and bug fixing existing code.

projects.shortDescription: Build of an innovative recipe site, including video assets, shopping lists and a fullscreen cooking mode.

extendedInfo.agencyDetails: Sapient is a consulting and technology company with a global headcount of over 7k.
